transcript:
Customer: Is karam ka karu shukr kaise ada, is karam ka karu shukr kaise ada.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, good afternoon sir.
Executive: Haan, good afternoon.
Customer: Ji, Raja Marble Traders se baat kar rahe hain, Raja, right?
Executive: Haan, Raja Marble Traders se.
Customer: Ji, Mr. Raja, mera naam Saransh hai, main IndiaMART ki head office se baat kar raha tha, business manager se aap.
Customer: Ji, actually na, aap logo ka ek concern mere paas open tha, ye gaadiyon ka concern, ki isme aapne mention kiya hua tha ki aapka jo profile hai, woh deactivate karwana chahte hain, refund chahte hain, right?
Customer: Haan, sir.
Customer: Toh exactly main jaanta tha ki sir kya issue hum log face kar rahe hain jisse hum help kar sake aapko.
Customer: Sir, bilkul kuch response nahi mil raha hai.
Customer: Sir, hame bas response chahiye wapis.
Customer: But sir, refund ka toh sir hamare paas koi policy nahi hota on the basis of maturity.
Customer: Kya sir, wapis bolo kya keh rahe ho aap?
Customer: Sir, main bol raha hu on the basis of maturity company refund ka policy koi nahi hai hamare paas. Ki agar kisi customer ko maturity nahi milti hai, toh hum refund karte hain, aisa koi policy hamare paas hai nahi sir. Matlab agar technically dekhe koi issue aa raha hai toh definitely hum aapko help kar sakte hain, right? Aapki catalog pe.
Customer: Koi fayda nahi hai sir, teen mahine ho gaye abhi tak kuch bhi response nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Nahi woh agar response nahi mil raha toh sir uske catalog pe hame working karna padega na. Uske catalog pe sahi tarike se thoda sa aapko response ke kaam ke reply dena padega I guess.
Customer: Hame sir refund nahi chahiye wapis.
Executive: But refund ka koi policy hai nahi sir mere paas. Agar woh hota toh.
Customer: Refund ka sab policy hota hai sir.
Customer: Itna bada hum kuch cheez kar rahe hain toh refund ka policy toh hoga hi na.
Executive: Maturity ke grounds pe refund nahi provide kar sakte na. Matlab dekhiye company aap logo ko jo ye promotion diya hua hai, right? Woh dene ka reason ye hai ki koi customer agar aapke product ke regarding hamare paas agar search kar raha hai, right? Toh hum aap logo ki presence uske samne present kar sake aur agar woh aapse connect karna chahe toh woh aapse kar sakta hai. Jo buylead aap consume karte hain aap unse baat karna chahe toh aap baat kar sakte hain, right? Baaki uske upar convince karna kya deal aana hai kya nahi aana hai kya aapki offering hai us customer ke liye, right? Woh toh directly depend karega aapki aur uski deal ke upar. Woh usme IndiaMART aur IIMD bilkul bhi intervene nahi karta hai sir. Toh basically yaha pe refund isliye possible nahi hai kyunki aap log customer ko kya deal offer kar rahe hain, right? Aur kya customer interested hai ya nahi hai.
Customer: Sir, zyadatar sir, zyadatar customer fake hi aa rahe hain. Humne toh dekh liya.
Executive: Kya aa rahe hain?
Customer: Fake aa rahe hain, fake hai.
Executive: Zyadatar customers aap bata rahe hain fake aa rahe hain.
Executive: Abhi aap logo ne recently kuch buyleads consume kiye hue hain, mujhe ek baar thoda sa inka feedback dijiyega. Ab jaise main dekh raha hu aap logo ne ek customer ki buylead purchase kari thi 12 tarikh ko. Outdoor marble fountain ki Bengaluru se, Somya ki. Kya baat hui aapki isse?
Customer: Sir, usne abhi tak phone nahi uthaya hai bilkul bhi. Ek baar response nahi diya.
Executive: Toh aapne kisi aur alternate number se try karke dekha sir?
Customer: Sir, do number se bhi try kar lete hain, uthate nahi phone hi bilkul hi.
Executive: Aur ek buylead aap logo ne 16 tarikh ko consume kari thi kal. Marble ki.
Customer: Bilkul koi nahi uthate phone hi hai, sirf buylead le lete hain, humari zindagi kharab kar di.
Executive: Matlab ye toh thoda general reply ho gaya ki phone nahi uthate. Kya aap unhe dusre dusre number se try karte hain connect karne ka? Factly isliye puch raha hu sir dekhiye, ye jo buyleads ye jo aap keh rahe hain ki phone nahi uthate, right? Inhi mein se kuch customers aap logo ke competitor ke saath.
Customer: Sir, aap sab, aap sab sir refund kara do bas khali.
Executive: Sir, refund ka policy nahi hai mere paas on the basis of conversion nahi hai. Agar ho pata main definitely kara deta.
Customer: Nahi sir, ye kuch sudhara ho bilkul sir.
Executive: Main aapke catalog pe dekh raha hu jo jo matlab thoda sa matlab hum.
Customer: Nahi sir, hamare dekh sakte hain partner bhi hai na aisa bahut se agencies hai. Kuch koi nahi maan raha hai.
Customer: Hamare ko partner bhi hai na hamare lar mein.
Customer: Jude hue hain jaise partner rehte hain na group mein.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Woh bhi koi nahi maan rahe, sab ke sab farzi bata rahe hain isko bhi.
Executive: Sir yaha, yaha toh likha hua hai ki ye proprietorship firm hai, partnership kaha se aa gaya sir?
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Aapne toh yaha pe proprietorship likha hai na, proprietorship firm hai ye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh partner kaha se aa gaya?
Customer: Sir, waise hamara, hum dost hai na.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Waise hi.
Executive: Accha, lekin main dekh raha hu sir Makrana mein toh aur bhi bahut saare log hain jo registered hai aur kaafi accha business chala rahe hain. Marble, marble Makrana karke, Global Marble Art hai matlab.
Customer: Sir, sir, sir main kya bol raha hu.
Customer: Hame sab pata hai, koi kuch nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Sir agar aisa hota toh aapke area mein toh marble store wale hain, Ipex Marble Handicraft hai, marble, nahi sorry Marble Makrana karke, Global Marble Art hai matlab.
Executive: In fact inhone toh Turkey bhi liya hua hai jo ki.
Customer: Sir, main, sir.
Customer: Main aapko wapis kaun se number pe kar sakta hu?
Executive: Haan sir, is number pe call bhi kar sakte hain, usme koi problem nahi hai. But mujhe bas yahi jaanna tha kyunki itne saare logo ko business mil pa raha hai, aisa toh hai nahi ki hum aapko jhooth bolna chahenge.
Customer: Nahi nahi, main abhi, main abhi. Naake free hota hu phir wapis aap karta hu phone.
Executive: Aap mujhe ek baar na free hokar call back kijiyega. Let's discuss in detail aur sort out karte hain.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Haan sir.
Executive: Okay sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the subscription.

- Claims most buyleads are fake and unresponsive.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund not possible as per policy.

- Executive suggested improving catalog and response strategy.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after getting free.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, fake leads
